```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library (tidyverse)
setwd ("C:/Users/jprout/OneDrive - University of Maryland School of Medicine/Documents/R/thehours")

d <- read_csv ("hourlydata.csv")

d$date <- as.Date(d$date, "%m/%d/%y")

d$time <- paste (d$hour, ":00", sep = "")

d$datetime <- as.POSIXct(paste(d$date, d$time), format="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")


```

```{r}
sm <- d %>%
  select(datetime, mood, anx, asleep, overwhelm, lightness, rain)
```


```{r pivot longer?}
long <- pivot_longer (sm, mood:rain, names_to = "experience",
                      values_to = "value")

#changing NA to 0 seems like a good idea
long[is.na(long)] = 0

```

```{r}
mood <- ggplot(long %>% filter (experience == "mood"), 
               aes (x = datetime, y = value)) +
  geom_area (color = "red", 
             fill = "red") 

mood
  
```

```{r}

sleep <- ggplot (long %>% filter (experience == "asleep"),
                    aes (x=datetime, y=value)) +
                    geom_area (fill = "blue")
sleep
```

```{r}
ggplot (data = long, aes (x=datetime, y=value, color = experience, fill = experience))+
  geom_area ()
```
